description:
In "Chickempic," the multiplayer mode of Viviter where you can play with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Chicken Jones" mini-game!
As we ventured into the depths of the ruins in search of treasure, the final puzzle to guard the treasure revealed itself.
A balance scale, stone statues... Ah, I see.
We need to place something on the other side of the scale that's the same size as the stone statue.
Once we understand that, it's simple; just draw it. Isn't that right, Junior?
The treasure is just around the corner.
name: Additional mini-game "Chicken Jones"
